sourcesContent: // logout() { // const logoutUser = this.goals.find((u) => u.username === this.goals.username); // if (logoutUser) { // const currentDate = new Date(); // logoutUser.signOut = currentDate.toLocaleTimeString(); // } // }, // selectDate(date) { // const selectedGoals = this.goals.filter((goal) => goal.date === date); // this.workingHours = selectedGoals.map((goal) => ({ // date: goal.date, // hours: this.calculate(goal.signIn, goal.signOut), // })); // }, // //workingHours // calculate(signIn, signOut) { // if (signIn && signOut) { // const signInTime = new Date(`2000-01-01 ${signIn}`); // const signOutTime = new Date(`2000-01-01 ${signOut}`); // const timeDiff = signOutTime - signInTime; // const hours = Math.floor(timeDiff / (1000 * 60 * 60)); // const minutes = Math.floor((timeDiff % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60)); // return `${hours} hrs ${minutes} mins `; // } else { // return "0"; // } // }
